Html:
Hi,

 

Great work on this project!  I am having a small problem trying to create a setup project.  If I just a new setup project and add the Primary output from Demo.WindowsPresentation I always generate an the following error: 

"Error 1 An error occurred while validating.  HRESULT = '80004005' C:\Scratch\greatmaps_e68f33250c31\Setup1\Setup1.vdproj Setup1"

Any help would be appreciated!

 

Thanks,

Mark
strange, what target do you use?

Yeah, its pretty strange! I've been trying to resolve this for over a day .
I've been using x86. I think I have all of the relevant projects set in the configuration manager set to x86. Does this work for you right with no problems?
Thanks,
Mark

From: [email removed]
Sent: Wednesday, June 30, 2010 3:18 PM
To: [email removed]
Subject: Re: Setup Project [greatmaps:217906]

From: radioman

strange, what target do you use?
only the application(*.exe) needs to be x86 if you use sqlite, other projects can be any

I'm only doing x86 because of another project I'm including. If I just use the zip file without modifications (and on another machine) I still get the same results.
Thanks,
Mark

From: radioman
Sent: Wednesday, June 30, 2010 11:30 PM
To: mfalberts@hotmail.com
Subject: Re: Setup Project [greatmaps:217906]

From: radioman

only the application(*.exe) needs to be x86 if you use sqlite, other projects can be any
what do you mean ' zip file'?

The download from Codeplex "greatmaps-e68f33250c31.zip"

From: [email removed]
Sent: Thursday, July 01, 2010 6:57 AM
To: [email removed]
Subject: Re: Setup Project [greatmaps:217906]

From: radioman

what do you mean ' zip file'?
do you talk about setup included in demo solution? it's for mobile, but actually i've never used it ;}

No, I created a new setup program - other projects/setup. I added the WPF demo/primary output. Using VS2008 - that is what generated the error.

From: [email removed]
Sent: Thursday, July 01, 2010 8:52 AM
To: [email removed]
Subject: Re: Setup Project [greatmaps:217906]

From: radioman

do you talk about setup included in demo solution? it's for mobile, but actually i've never used it ;}

well to be sure, i've created setup project included active Demo.WindowsPresentation, works as usual, good ;} try some test console project and make setup for it, maybe visual studio struggling somehow ;}

Ok, thanks. I've tried it on two machines with the same results. Crazy. I've created a lot of setup projects before and have several active setup projects going now with no problems so I'm kind of stuck. Damn. Well thanks for your time anyhow.

From: [email removed]

Subject: Re: Setup Project [greatmaps:217906]

From: radioman

well to be sure, i've created setup project included active Demo.WindowsPresentation, works as usual, good ;} try some test console project and make setup for it, maybe visual studio struggling somehow ;}

So you know here is exactly what I'm doing:
1) Unzip greatmaps-e68f33250c31.zip
2) Add new Setup project (Setup1)
3) Added primary output for Demo.WindowsPresentation. Interesting thing at this point is that NO dependencies show up.
4) After attempting to build I get this:

bummer. I don't have an accessible web site.

one project doesn't build, unload testing projects

I removed all testing project, all windows forms project and just left Demo.Windows.Presentation, GMap.Net.Core, and GMap.NetWindowsPresentation. I cleaned, rebuilt and ran with no problems.
I deleted the setup project, added a new one and had the same results:
Error 1 An error occurred while validating. HRESULT = '80004005' C:\Scratch\greatmaps-e68f33250c31\greatmaps_e68f33250c31\Setup2\Setup2.vdproj Setup2
I'm running VS2008 (9.307291.1 SP) on all of my machines - all having the same problem.. could this be the issue?
